    • addorUpdateUser

      public void addorUpdateUser(String username, String userInfo) throws IOException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      This function will be called to add or update any user entity to the map and saving the updated information back into the users.json file
      Specified by:
      addorUpdateUser in interface UserDataInterface
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the current modified or added user
      userInfo - the summarized user information of the current modified or added user

    • userIdExists

      public boolean userIdExists(String username) throws IOException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      This function will be called to check if a user entity already has been entered in users.json file
      Specified by:
      userIdExists in interface UserDataInterface
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the current modified or added user
      Returns:
      true if the username was found from the users.json file and false otherwise

    • userAsString

      public String userAsString(String username) throws IOException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      This function will be called to retrieve the stored information from users.json of a user based on its username
      Specified by:
      userAsString in interface UserDataInterface
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the desired user
      Returns:
